text: Elizabeth Patterson (November 22, 1874 â€“ January 31, 1966) was an American actress. She gained popularity late during her career. She played Matilda Trumbull in I Love Lucy. She also played Aunt Hester in the movie A Bill of Divorcement. She later acted in stage and theater. Patterson was born in Savannah, Tennessee. She died in Los Angeles at age 91 from pneumonia. title: Elizabeth Patterson
